AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rock lover
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] really loved rocks and went around looking for different species of rock on the daily.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: smart kid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was considered one of the smart kids in [PAWN_possessive] elementary school. This had strange effects on [PAWN_possessive] psyche.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slow bowling champion
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was known far and wide for being the best slow bowler in [PAWN_possessive] homeland. [PAWN_pronoun] was considered like a god by [PAWN_possessive] peers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hardened criminal
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] adulthood constantly committing heinous crimes such as going 67 miles per hour in a 45 mile per hour zone.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rock teacher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years learning the way of the rock. Once [PAWN_pronoun] had achieved full mastery, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to share [PAWN_possessive] wisdom by teaching rock class at a local community college, training others in the knowledge of rock and also warning them about the dangers of global warming.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: frog rancher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] owned and operated a ranch specializing in frogs. [PAWN_pronoun] raised many different species of frog, including some of the more exotic ones.
